channel.title: paper notes on Sambhav Singh Rohatgi
channel.description: Recent content in paper notes on Sambhav Singh Rohatgi

item.title: YOLO V4
item.description: These are notes for my reading of the YOLO v5 paper. Check out the orignal paper at the link below YOLO v4 -- High Level # They create a CNN that operates in real time on a conventional GPU and can be trained on a single GPU as well.

item.title: Segment Anything
item.description: These are notes for my reading of the segment anything paper. Check out the orignal project page by Meta AI at the link below Segment Anything by Meta AI High Level # Main idea behind the model is to build a foundational model for Computer Vision similar to the state of the NLP community + allow it to be promptable.
